Posts.EditableText:
I thought I said hell too...
Don't see much wrong in the word myself. Can mean a vast myriad of meanings, and not one of them rude or vile... Unless you count the place of 'hell' as vile, which is actually deterministic on your point of view or religeon.

I'd like to think topic's wouldn't get locked over single words - and more over sentances, or the what the topic was changing toward.
